src:
Aji Santoso Bicara Empat Mata dengan Irfan Jaya, Ini yang Dibahas
01 Nov 2019, 21:13 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pelatih Persebaya Surabaya, Aji Santoso berbicara empat mata dengan Irfan Jaya saat latihan di Lapangan Mapolda Jatim. Aji memanggil Irfan secara khusus ke tengah lapangan saat yang lain sudah berlatih.
Menurut Aji, dirinya sengaja berbicara empat mata dengan Irfan Jaya karena tidak pernah bertemu sebelumnya. Sebab, saat tim melakukan meeting, Irfan Jaya tidak ikut serta.
"Irfan Jaya barusan pulang, dia melakukan terapi tradisional, saya juga memang belum pernah ketemu dengan dia," kata Aji Santoso, Jumat (1/11/2019).
"Karena kemarin dia pulang waktu kami mengadakan meeting pemain, tadi ketemu sama saya, saya ngobrol sama dia," sambungnya.
Seperti diketahui, Aji Santoso mulai menukangi Persebaya sejak Kamis (31/10/2019) kemarin. Dia menggantikan Wolfgang Pikal yang memilih mundur sehari sebelumnya.

Scroll ke bawah untuk informasi selengkapnya ya Bolaneters
text:
Aji Santoso Talks Four-Eyes with Irfan Jaya, This Is Discussed
Nov 01 2019, 21:13 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persebaya Surabaya trainer, Aji Santoso talks privately with Irfan Jaya during training at the East Java Regional Police Headquarters. Aji specifically called Irfan into the middle of the field when the others were practicing.
According to Aji, he deliberately spoke privately with Irfan Jaya because he had never met before. Because, when the team held a meeting, Irfan Jaya did not participate.
"Irfan Jaya just returned home, he did traditional therapy, I also have never met him," said Aji Santoso, Friday (11/01/2019).
"Because yesterday he came home when we had a player meeting, I met him earlier, I talked with him," he continued.
As is known, Aji Santoso began to coach Persebaya since Thursday (10/31/2019) yesterday. He replaces Wolfgang Pikal who chose to resign the day before.

Scroll down for more information, Bolaneters
